attributes.action: make people more aware in the uk of PCOS, and the way women really have to live
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my petition is for women with PCOS to have the right to be heard, as  PCOS sufferer, i understand and know exactly what these women go through daily, PCOS affects more than the reproductive system, it leaves many women, including myself, infertile, with weight issues, confidence issues, it affects emotional health, physical appearence, and brings with it a host of other illnesses. women should not have to live in silence.
